named-query.name: EntryStatus.unreadCounts
named-query.query: select sub.id, count(s) from FeedEntryStatus s LEFT JOIN s.subscription sub where sub.user=:user and s.read=false group by sub.id

named-query.name: EntryStatus.deleteOlderThan
named-query.query: delete from FeedEntryStatus s where s.id in (select s2.id from FeedEntryStatus s2 where s2.starred = false and s2.entry.inserted < :olderThan)
